mdq:check.name: Resource License
mdq:check.description: Check that a resource usage license exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource license is not present if 'resourceLicense' not in globals() or resourceLicense is None: output = "A resource license was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(resourceLicense)): output = "The resource license is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource license is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(resourceLicense, str) or isinstance(resourceLicense, unicode)): output = "The resource license '{}' was found".format(resourceLicense) elif (isinstance(resourceLicense, ArrayList)): output = "The resource license '{}' was found (first of {} licenses)".format(resourceLicense[0].strip(), resourceLicense.size()) else: output = "The resource license '{}' was found)".format(resourceLicense) status = "SUCCESS" return True
